price: وە ڕۆژێک ئاسمان لەت دەبێت لەگەڵ ھەورێکی سپی (ھەموو ئاسمان دەگرێتەوە) وە فریشتەکان دەنێردرێنە خوارەوە کۆمەڵ کۆمەڵ
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِٱلۡغَمَٰمِ وَنُزِّلَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ تَنزِيلًا

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayawma tashaqqaqu al-samāu bil-ghamāmi wanuzzila al-malāikatu tanzīlan
